display_long_description:
# The Ultimate Mixed Reality Demo Experience
New Quest 3 or 3S? Panic Room is a collection of innovative, demo-style experiences made to show off the power of mixed reality while making your friends and family scream! Your space will be invaded and destroyed by thousands of spiders and then become the set of one of Hollywood's most famous horror scenes.

[media]

# Next Gen Mixed Reality Technology
We developed *ground breaking* MR room destruction technology only possible on Quest 3 and 3S hardware.

[media]

# Afraid of Spiders?
Defend your home from an invasion of thousands of spiders of all sizes using all the weapons at your disposal including bricks, nail guns, and shotguns. Just don't miss your throws or shots or you’ll destroy your room!

[media]

# That Famous Horror Movie Scene
Inspired by that iconic horror movie scene everyone knows and fears, place a virtual TV on your wall and see what happens next! It’s not for the faint of heart.

[media]

# Early Access
Panic Room MR is in early access with these first two demo style experiences. We plan to build out and refine these experiences in addition to adding more based on community feedback! Thank you for the support!

# Health and Safety Warning
Panic Room MR contains content which some users may find frightening or intense. Users should refer to the in-game EULA and Safety Guidelines to limit the risk of serious injury or harm.

New Quest 3 or 3S? Panic Room is a collection of innovative, demo-style experiences made to show off the power of mixed reality while making your friends and family scream! Your space will be invaded and destroyed by thousands of spiders and then become the set of one of Hollywood's most famous horror scenes.

# Next Gen Mixed Reality Technology
We developed *ground breaking* MR room destruction technology only possible on Quest 3 and 3S hardware.

![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974860_1277766079913581_9175760273034661255_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=flj9WmiIIYQQ7kNvwGV39KP&_nc_oc=Adl8VciLIG66GziCuDdyMOwK_fgADEU_Qoh_V6n8ZmHI3WZuTWQPA353kY0ZGN3Yi-c&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Tuo4vRNPdKPhUb8yMgDzUg&oh=00_Afpp_Wj7CZs0IrnY79oVnH8AAx2emIkVIbidhIkAmw_rZw&oe=695DFA87)

# Afraid of Spiders?
Defend your home from an invasion of thousands of spiders of all sizes using all the weapons at your disposal including bricks, nail guns, and shotguns. Just don't miss your throws or shots or you’ll destroy your room!

![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/57570304_521758160763442_5617283706981788097_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=EM34k_HksA4Q7kNvwH4KuiL&_nc_oc=Adn4tSF4x2xNnhqPEYvdr0QKd2-7-8WaICxZ9EdmEhfkIp3J2IsKqLDYXcpXhc--1ec&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Tuo4vRNPdKPhUb8yMgDzUg&oh=00_AfrZgAR6UyO-OgRAo9AcWDuR0Bb6nSGYT0IYQooMX7Vlwg&oe=695DE7F7)

# That Famous Horror Movie Scene
Inspired by that iconic horror movie scene everyone knows and fears, place a virtual TV on your wall and see what happens next! It’s not for the faint of heart.

![{"height":420,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/86620695_559780956998768_4674378634287842560_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=MM2KRKj2z1sQ7kNvwFSuIok&_nc_oc=AdkdzuKEgMpBV-WlP7TCFjDIQ2I0NlCKjDIX9Od7FYbDLK01U7ahWqpSMFrvMFa9R-w&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=Tuo4vRNPdKPhUb8yMgDzUg&oh=00_AfpSDZnzbIgfDC_43hvFfXRymH9mzewwysUEN4sgMmUOzw&oe=695DD465)

# Early Access
Panic Room MR is in early access with these first two demo style experiences. We plan to build out and refine these experiences in addition to adding more based on community feedback! Thank you for the support!

# Health and Safety Warning
Panic Room MR contains content which some users may find frightening or intense. Users should refer to the in-game EULA and Safety Guidelines to limit the risk of serious injury or harm.
